v.v: God, listen to me as I tell you the things about which I am worried.
Protect me from what wicked men are planning to do to me;
The hostile things they say are like sharp swords;
They are not afraid of anyone; they lie about people and slander those who have done no wrong.
They encourage each other about doing the evil things that they are planning to do;
because we have planned very well the things that we are going to do.”
But it will be as though God will shoot his arrows at them,
Because what they say proves they are guilty, God will get rid of them.
Then everyone will be afraid to sin because of what might happen to them also;
Righteous people should rejoice because of what Yahweh has done;

v: I am afraid of my enemies; please save me from them.
protect me from that group of men who do what is evil.
their cruel words are like arrows.
They are like someone who suddenly jumps up from where he is hiding and shoots arrows at his enemies.
they talk with each other about where they can set traps to catch people.
They say, “No one will see what we are doing
What people can think and plan in their inner beings is truly amazing!
and suddenly they will be wounded.
Everyone who sees what has happened to them will shake their heads to mock them.
they will tell others what God has done,
and they themselves will think much about it.
they should go to him to find refuge;
and all those who honor him will praise him.
